thread.title: Fred Parkin
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Fred Parkin

author: Fred Parkin
title: Fred Parkin
text:
The mats appear to be excellent quality and fit very well. The only downside was that I had to drive 3 miles to pick them up myself .However, would still buy from this company again because of the quality of the goods . Perhaps they should consider another carrier
In response to Official Car Mats comment:-
Mats were delivered by Royal Mail who finding us out returned them to depot despite me leaving garage door unlocked as stated on order form . Still more than happy to deal with, and recommend Official Car Mats
